wikipedia_page.main: Richard Crawley (22 February 1831 – 27 February 1897) was an English cricketer. He played three first-class matches for Cambridge University Cricket Club between 1852 and 1854.

response: Richard Crawley (26 December 1840 – 30 March 1893)Obituary in The Times, 8 April 1893 was a Welsh writer and academic, best known for his translation of Thucydides's History of the Peloponnesian War.Internet Classics Archive
